card.name: Demonic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Demonic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Opt
card.text: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Draw a card.

card.name: Opt
card.text: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Draw a card.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Lorehold Command
card.text: Choose two — • Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token. • Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn. • Lorehold Command deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life. • Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.

card.name: Prismari Command
card.text: Choose two — • Prismari Command deals 2 damage to any target. • Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards. • Target player creates a Treasure token. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Quandrix Command
card.text: Choose two — • Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand. • Counter target artifact or enchantment spell. • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. • Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Silverquill Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. • Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Target player draws a card and loses 1 life. • Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Witherbloom Command
card.text: Choose two - • Target player mills three cards, then you return a land card from your graveyard to your hand. • Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. • Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn. • Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Chalice of the Void
card.text: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

card.name: Cranial Plating
Lotus Bloom
card.text: Suspend 3—{0} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {0} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Bloom: Add three mana of any one color.

card.name: Path to Exile
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Relentless Rats
card.text: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.
